results.title: Time
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “The Dance series”
For the dancer, time is the awareness of duration. The film moves from the traditional musical definition of time into other areas of the time sense.

results.title: Timber town
results.creator_credit: Oliver Howes, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: Looks at life in a timber town located in the hardwood forest area of the southwestern coast of Western Australia. Shows Karri forests, tree felling, reforestation, controlled burning of undergrowth, timber hauling and milling. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: Thursday's children
results.creator_credit: Guy Brenton, Lindsay Anderson, Morse Films and World Wide
results.brief_description: Academy award winning documentary by Lindsay Anderson and Guy Brenton about the problem of educating children who are born deaf, and stresses the mutual trust and spontaneity of expression that deafness gives these children in compensation. Narrated by Sir Richard Burton, the Royal School for the Deaf in Margate is used to demonstrate how children must first be introduced to the idea of words, understand when words are spoken and to reproduce sounds they cannot hear. A masterpiece of sensitivity and dignity.

results.title: Three wise men of the world
results.brief_description:
A report on the Republic of South Africa - its peoples, cultures and transitions from yesterday into today. The overall socially and economically complex structure is light-heartedly parodied as something which can only too easily appear vastly different to differing observers.
A public relations representation of South Africa in the late 1960s ignoring the contemporary political and racial tensions of the time.

results.title: Three types of welds
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Gas Welding”
Part of a series of nine short instructional films showing methods for oxyacetylene welding from setting-up procedures, through flame adjustments. This part describes the types of welds that can be used in gas welding.

results.title: [Return to Michigan]
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “This Week”.
In 1976, tragedy struck the farmers at Michigan. A poisonous chemical, PBB, had been mixed into stock food, and all livestock had to be killed and the contamination was passed on through foods for human consumption causing much illness.
